frontmatter.title: This feeling, when I don't clear tasks
frontmatter.description: Do you use Jira? It's nice when you clear stories one after another, isn't it? Or do you dream about soloprenuer freedom? My recent experience is that being free from outside contracts and having opportunity to do somethin on your own, perhaps new - in a blue ocean, looks good only upfront, but when confronted, it's scary and full of high waves. Sincere post.
